headline: Will Diverging Analyst Views on Demand and Backlog Trends Change PulteGroup's (PHM) Narrative
summary: In recent days, analysts at major banks have updated their views on PulteGroup ahead of its January 29, 2026 earnings release, reflecting differing opinions on how softer demand, rising inventory, and an 8.2% average backlog decline over two years could affect the homebuilder’s fundamentals. While some research outlets highlight PulteGroup’s strong balance sheet, high third‑party quality scores, and above‑industry historical growth metrics, others emphasize forecast revenue contraction and...
